<div id="mp_advanced_data_migration" class="registered_link"></div>

For larger databases that require a parallel data load, you can use one of the following:

-   The EDB Postgres Advanced Server database link feature (for compatibility with Oracle databases)
-   A Dblink or a database link style migration (if your data contains `CLOB` data)

For more information, see the [Migration Toolkit](/migration_toolkit/latest/).
